mapInfo.author: The_Spellweaver
mapInfo.name: CrazySummoners {version}
mapInfo.loadingScreenDescription:
- Summon skills and spells cost Orbs of various colors.
- Check out your spellbook to decide how to build.
- Use lumber to expand your Orb pool.
- If unit reaches enemy crystal, heroes on their team lose 1 hp.

- Game is lost when all heroes on your team die.
